title: Tamagotchi App
description: A user-friendly Virtual Pet Website incorporating interactive user engagement, featuring local storage for seamless data persistence.

title: Sonic Summit Festival App
description: A festival app made using MERN stack in which users can log in using Auth0 and can favourite Artists and add them to their own personal schedule

title: Horned Beasts App
